attributes.action: Police Corruption and Assaults against the Public must be taken more seriously
attributes.additional_details:
The levels of Police Corruption that are being highlighted in this country is appauling.

Clearly there needs to be a considerable effort and funding by the Government in order to take public complaints more seriously and enable the public to have more confidence that these allegations are in fact taken seriously and will be fully investigated.

The Government should ensure that no cases are not fully investigated and more resources are available to ensure that a full proper outcome of the investigation is achieved.  The public must have trust in their police force and they must be held accountable for their actions if unlawful
